name: Bubonic King Vermin
text:
"Bubonic Vermin" + 1+ Beast monsters
If this card is Fusion Summoned: Shuffle all "Bubonic Vermin" in the GY into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. If the card drawn by this card's effect(s) is

, reveal it, and if you do, draw 1 card. This card's name becomes "Bubonic Vermin" when in the GY. The original ATK of this card becomes 900 x the number of additional "Bubonic" monsters used for its Special Summon.

Concept by TheLoneCarrot/bloco100
